author: Special Correspondent
text:
Six persons, including four schoolchildren, were injured after a government bus hit a roadside tree at Thoppampatti near Vaiyampatti on Tuesday.

The bus was on its way to Manapparai from Kannuthu when the accident occurred. The injured were treated as out-patients at the Manapparai Government Hospital. The Vaiyampatti police are investigating, police sources said.
title: Six injured as bus rams tree
